channel.title: When do you think BM (retail/Steam) will get released?
channel.description:
I think this year (June - December).
I also hope the game won't get delayed (again) :-\
[COLOR='DimGray']([b]To moderators[/b]: Sorry if I am not allowed to make such topic. You can move it to the right sub-forum / lock it / delete it, but please, don't ban me. I hope you understand.)

item.title: When do you think BM (retail/Steam) will get released?
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Yes. Please don’t. There’s no point in making such threads. Locked.

Read full topic

item.title: When do you think BM (retail/Steam) will get released?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Oh wow, it’s like we’re back to the old forums before a release date for the mod was announced.

Anyway, yeah, these release date speculation threads are generally an exercise in uselessness and they never go anywhere.

Read full topic
